title: Grid Illumination
content:

Finally, you are given a query array , where . For the  query, determine whether  is illuminated or not. After answering the  query, turn off the lamp at  and its 8 adjacent lamps if they exist. A lamp is adjacent if its cell shares either a side or corner with .
